title: VVit's never good till 'tis bought: or, Good counsell for improvident men fit to make use of now and then. To the tune of Basses Carreere.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?, attributed name.
notes: Printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
